title: RIOT NEEDS "ARE YOU SURE?" BUTTON!!!!!
body: I unlocked a legendary skin and I could have sworn I clicked the "upgrade to skin permanent" button, but through some combination of common store lag and not paying attention I must have hit the disenchant button once because now its gone and I have more essence than I intended. So just like every other electronic store that exists, Riot needs an "Are you sure?" button to prevent just this from happening.

replies.body:
Just to confirm, the "are you sure" button does exist!  Any time that you go to disenchant or upgrade a shard, another dialogue box appears asking you to confirm your choice.  You can test this out yourself on any piece of content, just make sure you hit "cancel" when the additional box appears.

I hope this helps clarify!

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=vfHnU96b,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-17T21:44:25.294+0000)
>
> Just to confirm, the "are you sure" button does exist!  Any time that you go to disenchant or upgrade a shard, another dialogue box appears asking you to confirm your choice.  You can test this out yourself on any piece of content, just make sure you hit "cancel" when the additional box appears.
> 
> I hope this helps clarify!

Well unfortunately, that's not true, that's never been true for me. Perhaps it's related to the fact that the store is crammed full of so many graphics that it lags severely every time I try and do even the most basic thing, like clicking one button or buying one rune. I put up with enough of losing ranked matches due to Riot's lag, I'm no longer putting up with getting conned out of something I spent money on due to your company's failure to create a functioning platform, this is at least the second time such an incident has happened to me.

The store definitely shouldn't lag to such a extreme degree when you click to different tabs or try to buy something.  We should be able to help you out and hopefully try to get this fixed, but first we need you to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  This way one of our Tech Specialists can work with you one-on-one in order to get this resolved.  Just make sure to provide this additional information as well:

1) [Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)

2) [Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)

3) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)

4) [DxDiag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)

I know it shouldn't, that's why I'm pissed off. I already submitted a ticket the night it happened. The store lags severely every single time I go to it and do anything, I constantly get processing glitches where it doesn't count things I buy, where I somehow have NEGATIVE rp and ip, where I somehow get more runes than I bought, you need to optimize the image files so they don't take as much memory to process.

Thank you for triggering my thoughts.
